NAME: Hall of Relics (AI)
TEXT: #IGNORE_CHAIN#Choose one at random: Summon an Ivory Pawn; summon an Ebony Pawn; summon a Chaos Key; Summon a Tome of Knowledge; Summon a Resource Optimizing Infusion Device; or Summon a Rootforged Regalia.

NAME: Hall of Relics (Player)
TEXT: #IGNORE_CHAIN#Each opposing champion gets "At the start of the game, if an opposing champion has an Ivory Pawn in play, choose one at random: Summon an Ebony Pawn; Summon a Chaos Key; Summon a Tome of Knowledge; Summon a Talisman of Vitae; Summon a Resource Optimizing Infusion Device; or summon a Rootforged Regalia. If an opposing champion has an Ebony Pawn in play, choose one at random: Summon an Ivory Pawn; Summon a Chaos Key; Summon a Tome of Knowledge; Summon a Talisman of Vitae; Summon a Resource Optimizing Infusion Device; or Summon a Rootforged Regalia. If an opposing champion has a Chaos Key in play, choose one at random: Summon an Ivory Pawn; Summon a Ebony Pawn; Summon a Tome of Knowledge; Summon a Talisman of Vitae; Summon a Resource Optimizing Infusion Device; or Summon a Rootforged Regalia. If an opposing champion has a Tome of Knowledge in play, choose one at random: Summon an Ivory Pawn; Summon a Ebony Pawn; Summon a Chaos Key; Summon a Talisman of Vitae; Summon a Resource Optimizing Infusion Device; or Summon a Rootforged Regalia. If an opposing champion has a Talisman of Vitae in play, choose one at random: Summon an Ivory Pawn; Summon a Ebony Pawn; Summon a Chaos Key; Summon a Tome of Knowledge; Summon a Resource Optimizing Infusion Device; or Summon a Rootforged Regalia. If an opposing champion has a Resource Optimizing Infusion Device in play, choose one at random: Summon an Ivory Pawn; Summon a Ebony Pawn; Summon a Chaos Key; Summon a Tome of Knowledge; Summon a Talisman of Vitae; or Summon a Rootforged Regalia. If an opposing champion has a Rootforged Regalia in play, choose one at random: Summon an Ivory Pawn; Summon a Ebony Pawn; Summon a Chaos Key; Summon a Tome of Knowledge; Summon a Talisman of Vitae; or Summon a Resource Optimizing Infusion Device."

NAME: Prospero, Sylvan Enchanter
TEXT: At the start of your turn, create a Tempest Hymn and put it into your hand.
FLAVOR: "What is it I see in the dark backward and abyss of time? A storm of madness approaches these shores; let us meet it with a tempest of our own."

NAME: Spectral Acorn
TEXT: Spectral    Deploy - Draw a card.    Exhaust -> Gain [L3][R0]. Gain three of the same thresholds of your choice. Then, put this into your hand. Replace this in your collection with a Mystic Squirrel. Irreversibly transform this into a Mystic Squirrel.

NAME: Mystic Squirrel
TEXT: Deploy - Create a random rare or legendary that you meet the threshold requirements to play and put it into your hand.

NAME: Tempest Hymn
TEXT: Target troop gets +2[ATK]/+2[DEF] this turn.

NAME: Chest'O Hex
TEXT: (1), Exhaust -> Add a treasure counter to #SELF#.    (5), Exhaust, Remove all treasure counters from this and sacrifice it -> Create a random card for each treasure counter removed this way and put them into your hand.

NAME: Princess Cory
TEXT: If Princess Cory is in your opening hand, he gets +6[ATK]/+6[DEF].    When Princess Cory deals damage to an opposing champion, summon a random legendary troop for each damage dealt.
FLAVOR: Krakens, Vampires, Angels, Dragons.... just what I wanted for my birthday!

NAME: Ninja Training
TEXT: Draw cards equal to this action's cost.    Once per turn, [BLOOD][BLOOD]: (2), Reveal this from your hand -> Target attacking troop gets -1[ATK]/-1[DEF] this turn. This gets cost +(1).

NAME: Orson's Dream
TEXT: (X) -> Transform this into a random troop with cost (X).

NAME: Spectral Assassin
TEXT: Before the start of the game, if this is in your deck, a random troop in an opposing champion's deck gets Death Sentence.    When an opposing champion plays a troop with Death Sentence, if this is in your hand, this gets cost -(5) this turn.    Deploy - Interrupt target troop.

NAME: The Crowd Roars!
TEXT: When a troop you control in play deals damage to a champion, if this is in your hand, this gets cost -(1) this turn.    Draw three cards. Those cards get "At end of turn, if this is in your hand, discard this" this turn.

NAME: Moment of Glory
TEXT: Target blocking troop or blocked troop you control gets +6[ATK]/+6[DEF] this turn. Then, move each Moment of Glory in your deck up three spaces.    [DIAMOND][DIAMOND]: When a troop you control blocks, if this is in the top three cards of your deck, play this for free.    [DIAMOND][DIAMOND]: When a troop you control becomes blocked, if this is in the top three cards of your deck, play this for free.

NAME: Entrath Settlers
TEXT: Deploy - Summon an Entrath Settlements.    Discard a Wrathwood Lumber and a Scrios Brick and a Dingler Wool and a Carloth Grain -> Summon an Entrath Settlement.    Discard three Kog'Tepetl Ores and two Carloth Grains -> Transform target Entrath Settlement you control into a Entrath City.    [BASIC]: Discard a Kog'Tepetl Ore and a Dingler Wool and a Carloth Grain -> Summon an Entrath Knight.    Discard four cards -> Put all cards in the choice zone into the played resources zone. Create a Carloth Grain and put it into the choice zone. Create a Dingler Wool and put it into the choice zone. Create a Kog'Tepetl Ore and put it into the choice zone. Create a Scrios Brick and put it into the choice zone. Create a Wrathwood Lumber and put it into the choice zone. You invoke "Put a card from the choice zone into your hand."

NAME: Entrath Settlement
TEXT: Deploy - Put all cards in the choice zone into the played resources zone. Repeat "Choose one at random: Create a Scrios Brick (1) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Scrios Brick (2) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Scrios Brick (3) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Scrios Brick (4) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Scrios Brick (5) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Kog'Tepetl Ore (1) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Kog'Tepetl Ore (2) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Kog'Tepetl Ore (3) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Kog'Tepetl Ore (4) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Kog'Tepetl Ore (5) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Dingler Wool (1) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Dingler Wool (2) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Dingler Wool (3) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Dingler Wool (4) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Dingler Wool (5) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Carloth Grain (1) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Carloth Grain (2) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Carloth Grain (3) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Carloth Grain (4) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Carloth Grain (5) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Wrathwood Lumber (1) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Wrathwood Lumber (2) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Wrathwood Lumber (3) and put it into the choice zone; Create a Wrathwood Lumber (4) and put it into the choice zone; or Create a Wrathwood Lumber (5) and put it into the choice zone." 6 times. You invoke "Play three cards in the choice zone for free."

NAME: Entrath City
TEXT: If this would create a Settlers resource, it creates that many +1 instead.

NAME: Entrath Knight
TEXT: Deploy - Choose one at random: Create a Scrios Brick and put it into your hand; Create a Wrathwood Lumber and put it into your hand; Create a Kog'Tepetl Ore and put it into your hand; Create a Carloth Grain and put it into your hand; or Create a Dingler Wool and put it into your hand.

NAME: Scrios Brick
TEXT: Gain a charge.    This deals 1 damage to a random opposing champion or troop.

NAME: Wrathwood Lumber
TEXT: Gain three charges.

NAME: Kog'Tepetl Ore
TEXT: Gain a charge.    A random troop you control gets +1[ATK]/+1[DEF].

NAME: Carloth Grain
TEXT: Gain a charge.    Gain 4 health.

NAME: Dingler Wool
TEXT: Gain a charge.    Summon a Dingler.

NAME: Lightning Elemental
TEXT: Swiftstrike    When this deals combat damage to an opposing champion, gain a charge.

NAME: Air Elemental
TEXT: Flight    When this deals combat damage to an opposing champion, your other Elementals get +1[ATK]/+1[DEF].

NAME: Water Elemental
TEXT: Spellshield    When this deals combat damage to an opposing champion, summon a Water Elemental.

NAME: Death Cap
TEXT: Lethal     When this deals damage to an opposing champion, that champion loses a charge.
FLAVOR: It's easy to identify mushrooms that are poisonous when they are spitting lethal toxins into your face.

NAME: Shiitake Chef
TEXT: At the start of your turn, choose one at random: A random troop you control gets +1[ATK]/+1[DEF]; Gain [L0][R1]; or Gain 1 health.
FLAVOR: Take spooon. Eat sooop. Goood?

NAME: Fungal Monstrosity
TEXT: Crush    Deploy - Each opposing champion summons five Shin'hare Jailors.    While an opposing champion controls a Shin'hare Jailor, this can't attack or block.

NAME: Blessing
TEXT: Gain 2 health.    Draw a card.

NAME: Healing Aura
TEXT: When you play a resource, gain 1 health.

NAME: Divine Altar
TEXT: When you play a Blessing, copy it.    When you play a Cleric, summon a copy of it.    At the start of your turn, if this is in your deck, move this in your deck up one space.

NAME: Blessing of the Immortals
TEXT: Play target card in your crypt for free.    Gain 2 health.    Draw a card.    Void this.

NAME: Monument of Faith
TEXT: Troops you control have Steadfast.

NAME: Genesis Leaf
TEXT: Sacrifice this -> Gain [L1][R0].

NAME: Blessing Rod
TEXT: When you play a Blessing, gain a charge.

NAME: Zodiac Dream
TEXT: Gain 0 health.    Draw a card.    Summon a random Coyotle with cost (2) or less.

NAME: Zodiac Plainsrunner
TEXT: Gain 8 health.    Draw a card.

NAME: Zodiac Thunderbird
TEXT: Gain 0 health.    Draw a card.    Summon a Thunderbird.

NAME: Zodiac Sands
TEXT: Gain 0 health.    Draw a card.    Take an additional turn after this one.

NAME: Zodiac Observer
TEXT: Gain 0 health.    Draw two cards.

NAME: Zodiac Sister Midnight
TEXT: Gain 0 health.    Draw a card.    Gain two charges.

NAME: Soul Vessel
TEXT: This has +1[ATK]/+1[DEF] for each artifact and/or constant you control.

NAME: Spell Sprite
TEXT: Flight    Deploy - Draw a card and gain 2[SP].

NAME: Knowledge is Power
TEXT: Target action in your hand gets "When you play this, copy it."

NAME: War Machine
TEXT: Crush, Speed    Deploy - Draw a card.    This has Rage 1 for each Warlord talent you've unlocked.    At the end of your turn, if this is in play or in your crypt, put this into your deck.

TEXT: Gain 4 health.    Draw a card.

TEXT: Before the start of the game, create #PET_RAT# and put it into play.    When #PET_RAT# dies, add two vulnerable counters to you.

NAME: Bonded for Life
TEXT: Before the start of the game, create #PET_SABRETOOTH# and put it into play.    When #PET_SABRETOOTH# dies, add two vulnerable counters to you.

NAME: Bonded for Life
TEXT: Before the start of the game, create #PET_SHROOMKIN# and put it into play.    When #PET_SHROOMKIN# dies, add two vulnerable counters to you.

NAME: Bonded for Life
TEXT: Before the start of the game, create #PET_BABY_SPIDER# and put it into play.    When #PET_BABY_SPIDER# dies, add two vulnerable counters to you.

NAME: Every Piece of the Animal
TEXT: When a Marked troop dies, gain 2 health.

NAME: Affinity: Plants
TEXT: When a Plant enters play under your control, there's a 25% chance to create a Seed Pod and put it into play.    When a Plant enters play under your control, there's a 5% chance to create a Plant Garden and put it into play.

NAME: Follow the Stars
TEXT: Before the start of the game, if you have 100 or more cards in your deck, create two Follow the Stars and put them into your deck. Otherwise, create a Follow the Stars and put it into your deck.

NAME: Royal Lion Keeper
TEXT: Before the start of the game, if you have 100 or more cards in your deck, create two Royal Lion Keepers and put them into your deck. Otherwise, create a Royal Lion Keeper and put it into your deck.

NAME: Veteran of War
TEXT: Your starting hand size is increased by 1.    Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.

NAME: Training: Tactics
TEXT: Your Trained troops have Steadfast and Swiftstrike.

NAME: Fury
TEXT: Before the start of the game, gain two charges.

NAME: Boiling Blood
TEXT: Before the start of the game, if you have 100 or more cards in your deck, create two Boiling Bloods and put them into your deck. Otherwise, create a Boiling Blood and put it into your deck.

NAME: Battle
TEXT: [BASIC]: [5] -> Forget all cards. Remember target opposing champion or troop. Deal 2 damage to remembered. If it is a troop, it deals damage equal to its [ATK] to you. If the remembered is a champion, create two Spiderling Eggs for each damage dealt and put them into that champion's deck.

NAME: Battle
TEXT: [BASIC]: [5] -> Forget all cards. Remember target opposing champion or troop. Deal 3 damage to remembered. If it is a troop, it deals damage equal to its [ATK] to you. If the remembered is a champion, create two Spiderling Eggs for each damage dealt and put them into that champion's deck.

While you control a Ruby Buffalo, your Buffalo have Rage 2.  While you control a Sapphire Buffalo, your Buffalo have Flight.  While you control a Wild Buffalo, your Buffalo have Lethal.

NAME: Fuel for the Fire

NAME: Insidious Exchange

NAME: Born to Die

NAME: Stormcall
TEXT: Exhaust all opposing troops.
FLAVOR: Coyotle mages are also known as "stormcallers" and "weather dancers". A group of mages can dance together to produce even more potent effects.

NAME: Wrong Turn
TEXT: Put up to two target troops into their controller's hand. They get "At the end of your turn, if this is in your hand, discard this" until the start of your next turn.

TEXT: Rage 1, Speed  When this attacks, this deals damage equal to its [ATK] to each opposing champion.

NAME: Technical Genius
TEXT: Your artifacts in all zones have cost -(1).
